Examples

This is the dragOpen example demo page.
Try dragging the page from left to right to open the menu.

Note: Although this feature was intended for touch-devices, it might not work as well as expected due to browser specific behavior.
Use with caution and test thoroughly!

Note: This will only work if jQuery.hammer.js is included.

  • Horizontal sliding submenus example
  • Vertical submenus example
  • Positioning the menu
  • Advanced example
  • One page scrolling example
  • Iconbar
  • Drag/swipe the menu open
